apAma#tiM durmaqtiM bAdha#mAnA rAqyaspOShE# yaqj~japa#timAqBaja#ntIq suva#d^^rdhEhiq yaja#mAnAyaq pOSha#maqSvinA$&ddhvaqryU sA#dayatAmiqha tvA$ || 
aqgnEH purI#Shamasi dEvaqyAnIq tAM tvAq viSvE# aqBi gRu#Nantu dEqvAH | 
stOma#pRuShThA GRuqtava#tIqha sI#da praqjAva#daqsmE draviqNA &&*ya#jasvAqSvinA$ &ddhvaqryU sA#dayatAmiqha tvA$ || 
diqvO mUqd^^rdhA&si# pRuthiqvyA nABi#rviqShTaMBa#nI diqSAmadhi#patnIq Buva#nAnAM | 8
